title: Four Seasons, Four Lessons: A Parable About Changing One's Fortune
description: In this book, four important lessons having to do with value, growth, leverage and wealth are presented in a simple story form. Easy to read, but with meaning wrapped within meaning, the question becomes what will you do with these lessons? Will you pass them by as so many do in the story, or will you recognize their potential value in your life?If you liked "The Richest Man In Babylon" or other similar stories about wealth, you will like this one.Kindle books can be read, whether you own a Kindle or not. Free viewers are available to download from Amazon for most any computer, notepad, or smartphone. You can even read Kindle books in your browser.
author: Chris  Humphreys
